snippet.title: JusTD - trailer from v0.5.0
snippet.description:
This is a short trailer of my upcoming game, called JusTD!

https://fairytalesgames.itch.io/justd

JusTD is a sci-fi themed tower defense game, where you will need to manage resources to be able to build turrets and other buildings. You also need to pay attention to enemies that can attack your buildings and towers, and you need to make sure you always have enough resources to repair them! Your turrets level up as they deal damage to enemies and they become stronger and stronger, but they have limited amount of ammunitions, so you need to build mines, refineries and factories to generate different types of resources and ammo for your turrets. Almost standard Tower Defense, but not quite. :)
